BUILDPACK_URL.description: Heroku buildpack for deploying Haskell apps

HALCYON_S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the Amazon S3 bucket in which Halcyon stores private archives and constraints files.

HALCYON_AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Amazon Web Services access key ID, used to authenticate S3 requests.

HALCYON_AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Amazon Web Services secret access key, used to authenticate S3 requests.
